AlbumName: The Marshall Mathers LP2 (Expanded Edition)

Here to stay
Even when I'm gone
When I close my eyes
Through the passage of time
Kings never die

And I'm not stopping 'til I'm on top again, all alone and on a throne

Here to stay
Even when I'm gone
When I close my eyes
Through the passage of time
Kings never die
